name: Sandwich Quest
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 98

Theme: Empty

Limitation: Make it a roguelike

Little Sandwich Man's stomach is empty and really wants a sandwich but he only has one piece of bread. Fight through Cup Land and collect more ingredients for your ultimate sandwich. Defeat the Big Cup Trio and get the final piece of bread for your sandwich. How big can you sandwich get?

Download game for better audio experience.
